definition[0]: a vehicle with no roof that is pulled by a horse and used for carrying heavy things
definition[1]: a large wire basket on wheels that you use in a supermarket
definition[2]: the place on an Internet shopping website where you put things that you wish to buy
definition[3]: a small table with wheels, used for moving and serving food and drinks
definition[4]: to take something somewhere in a cart, truck etc
example[0]: Household waste is carted away by the cityâ€™s Sanitation Department.
definition[5]: to carry something somewhere, especially something that is heavy or difficult to carry
example[1]: We carted all the furniture upstairs.
